Netscape Navigator 3.0 LiveConnect/Plugin Examples

The SDK contains these example plugins:

  • CharFlipper displays a series of characters specified in its data file, demonstrating LiveConnect, EMBED tag parameters, cross-platform development with maximal code reuse, stream dispatching, and animation.
  • NPAvi displays AVI movie files, and can be controlled with JavaScript using LiveConnect.
  • Simple is a basic plugin which writes "Hello, world!" on the screen and writes messages to the Java console. It is #ifdef'ed to be compileable on all of the platforms that Netscape Navigator supports.
  • WinTemplate is a basis on which you can build your own plugins for Netscape Navigator.
